title: Week 13 Picks Against the Spread, Best Bets, Gambling Advice (Football 11/29)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Pete Prisco and R.J. White for Week 13 gambling advice, covering all 13 games on Sunday and Monday. The guys discuss Packers-Giants (6:20), Redskins-Panthers (10:30), 49ers-Ravens (14:00), Titans-Colts (18:45), Eagles-Dolphins (21:50), Raiders-Chiefs (24:20), Bucs-Jags (29:05), Jets-Bengals (34:00), Rams-Cardinals (37:15), Chargers-Broncos (40:00), Browns-Steelers (41:30), Vikings-Seahawks (44:00) and Pats-Texans (48:30).
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
